attributes.action: lower congestion by half at Peak times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we were to stop People from driving their kids short distances to school then there would be less congestion and the worlds oil would last longer. The kids would be fitter as they could walk or cycle short distances to school. Then they could do more learning and less P E as they would be exercising whilst traveling.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
